channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1460054346280980482
item.description:

🇵🇪Promedio de muertes se sostiene en 30 desde inicios octubre https://t.co/eovuwPsDVH

item.description: Plastic pollution researchers know how to have fun. This weekend I tore apart a golf cart with @MarcusEriksen01 and then got veggies from @CapnMoore's garden. https://t.co/8GAn7EEHzg

item.title: #it @ 1459979952359710743
item.description:
La discrepanza tra Green Pass emessi per test negativo e Tamponi Effettuati non si è ancora risolta.
La spiegazione più probabile pare essere tamponi eseguiti in farmacie e segnalati per il Green Pass ma non per i resoconti giornalieri delle Regioni/PA.
https://t.co/xR9z3uVHDG https://t.co/zQ4xCMGIGi

item.title: #en @ 1459954475666452494
item.description:
It is not enough to have “all the data”!
Often, for action we must build a shared understanding around the narrative.
#OpenSource #OpenScience #OpenData @worldbankdata https://t.co/xqhexKieBD

item.title: #en @ 1459949360997937156
item.description: If your open data website only had dashboards and now way to access the underlying data is it really an open data website?

item.title: #ar @ 1459930619853611014
item.description: الى جانب قانون استقلالية القضاء وقوانين اخرى تطور عمل الدولة قانون الشفافية والبيانات المفتوحة او Open Data عالق في جوارير جورج عدوان يسمح هذا القانون للمواطن الإطلاع على كافة البيانات والمناقصات التي تتعلق بالمال العام عبر موقع الكتروني عينة من تواطؤ امل والقوات بالمجلس النيابي https://t.co/O98Y92XYWw

item.title: #en @ 1459928941016330252
item.description:
This is the most detailed map of toxic air in the USA: https://t.co/LJC3rWJUUW @ProPublica built it for us using @EPA data. Please help them make it better, so we can all hold our governments accountable for reducing cancer risk. This thread explains how.
#opengov #opendata #ddj https://t.co/ENswElUXzx https://t.co/c9rM3f0N2Z

item.title: #en @ 1459920916956299264
item.description: If you are 80 or older in the community and not vaccinated, you are at extremely high risk (red line). The blue line is 80+ who are fully vaccinated. source: ON open data, data to Oct 24. #GetVaccinatedNow https://t.co/GsYRQ9Z5ip

item.title: #en @ 1459569309009776648
item.description: Lesson 3: I was only able to do this analysis because the data and materials were open. Open data are great. But (to use a @siminevazire analogy) transparency only opens the hood. You still need to see what the engine looks like.

item.title: #en @ 1459524365595389953
item.description:
#EUSpace for #wetlands monitoring
The #Mississippi River Delta and several other wetlands across the world are threatened by #ClimateChange🌀🌊🌡️, poor human management👷‍♂️ etc.
#EUSpace supplies #OpenData to monitor this loss
⬇️#Copernicus #Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰️image of 8 November https://t.co/hbmsmgHl63

item.description: L'open data et l'accès au données brutes en santé et pharmacovigilance a été une des avancé de la crise du Covid mais comme toute avancée il y a un revers à la médaille : tout le monde n'est pas en capacité d'analyser des données brutes.

item.title: #it @ 1459073580763955225
item.description: Gli #opendata servono anche per l'interscambio tra PA e PA, perché sono facilmente disponibili sul Web, machine-readable, riutilizzabili da chiunque per qualunque scopo (licenza aperta). Forza, aprite i dati! Ci sono domini dove bisogna ancora fare tanto. Complimenti a Pierluigi! https://t.co/KCcr3p3iww
